QuestData.Title: Into the Azure
QuestData.Description:
We have done our part. Though I must remain here to watch over the Oathstone and guide the green dragonflight, know that you leave here with our gratitude and faith.
I have received word the Kirin Tor are seeking help in claiming the Azure Oathstone. Helping them with their Oathstone will bring us one step closer to healing Azeroth.
Find Pakina and Masud the Wise of the Kirin Tor. They will instruct you further. Safe journey and pleasant dreams, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Masud the Wise in the Forkriver Crossing.
QuestData.RewardText: Hail adventurer! I'm glad our call for help reached you.
